name: Sad Vlad
description:
Sad Vlad is a narrative game about a 1000 year old vampire that struggles to find meaning in the modern world. In the past, he could easily take blood from others whenever he wanted as he flew around his lavish mansion. Now, he barely makes ends meet with a fast food job. But maybe Vlad doesn't have to be so sad?

In this game, you'll play as Vlad as he lives his daily life in the city. Each week, you'll get to visit two locations of your choice (you can't visit the same location twice in any given week).

There are two endings you can get in this game.

Update: Fixed some grammar mistakes, changed some dialogue, made location selection more noticeable, and added a main menu

Thanks to everyone who worked on this project!
